Package wogwt.translatable.http

Interface Summary
AfterDOMUpdateCallback A simple callback used with the Updater classes to allow for custom actions after an HTTP request and response modifies the DOM.
 

Class Summary
LogOnErrorRequestCallback A request callback that does Log.error for any error
PeriodicUpdater This class will do an ajax request every X milliseconds to the url specified by the updateContainer's "updateUrl" attribute and replace the contents of the updateContainer with the response.
SingleFieldSubmitOnChangeListener Sends the value of only the changed field to the server using the form action url and updates a DOM container with the response Also see SubmitOnChangeListener to do an ajax submit that sends ALL form values.
SubmitOnChangeListener Sends the all the form values to the server using the form action url and updates a DOM container with the response Also see SingleFieldSubmitOnChangeListener to do an ajax submit that sends only a single form value.
SubmitOnClickListener Sends the all the form values to the server using the form action url and updates a DOM container with the response.
SubmitUpdater Sends the all the form values to the server using the form action url and updates a DOM container with the response.
UpdateOnClickListener Intended mainly to turn a regular WOHyperlink with an ACTION binding into an ajax link.
Updater This class will do an ajax request to the url specified by the updateContainer's "updateUrl" attribute and replace the contents of the updateContainer with the response.
WOGWTRequestCallback Adds an onSuccess method that can be used instead of onResponseReceived and treats all non-2xx responses as errors and calls onError.
